title: New release: Cavita, from TipoType
content:
**Hello Typophiles!**  
--------------------------------------------------  
We are proud to announce our new release!  
--------------------------------------------------

[**'Cavita'** by Vicente Lamónaca](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317104809/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/tipotype/cavita/?refby=tipotype), with a release offer of -80%

If you'd like to **support the type designers** please purchase directly at [**TipoType.com (Cavita)**](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317104809/http:/tipotype.com/cavita/) where the designer gets 80% of every sale.

[![Cavita](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317104809im_/http:/origin.myfonts.net/s/aw/original/315/0/161355.png "Cavita")](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317104809/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/tipotype/cavita/?refby=tipotype)
